description: Create cas_id using the unique identifier poly_id added during loading.
Only one LYR layer possible. If species info present, stand structure is S.

validation_rules: mb_fri_hasCountOfNotNull({species_1, species_2, species_3, species_4, species_5, species_6, species_7}, productivity, 1, FALSE|-8886)
translation_rules: mb_fri_countOfNotNull({species_1, species_2, species_3, species_4, species_5, species_6, species_7}, productivity, 2)
description: Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Up to a max of 2. Returns UNKNOWN_VALUE if num_of_layers is zero.
